statements: DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE record_id = 100 AND regulation = 'HIPAA';
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE regulation = 'GDPR' AND record_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE record_name = 'Audit Report';
DELETE FROM documentation WHERE record_id IN (SELECT record_id FROM compliance_records WHERE regulation_name = 'GDPR');
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_level < 3 AND date_of_creation < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type='Violations' AND regulatory_body='FDA'
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE regulation_code = 'GDPR' AND record_type = 'Incident';
